qas.question: A defeat by which team eliminated England from the 1970 FIFA World Cup?
What was the final score of England's last match of the 1970 FIFA World Cup?
In which year did England fail to qualify for the FIFA World Cup resulting in Ramsey's dismissal?
Where did the 1970 FIFA World Cup take place?
Where did the 1982 FIFA World Cup take place?
In what year was Ron Greenwood born?
In what country was the World Cup played in 1974?
Where was the World Cup played in 1974?
What was one of the teams England's football team played in the 1982 World Cup games?
In what year did Ron Greenwood take over leadership of England's football team?

context: England qualified for the <b9_0>1970<b9_0/> FIFA World Cup in <a3_0><b7_0>Mexico<b7_0/><a3_0/> as reigning champions, and reached the quarter-finals, where they were knocked out by <a0_0><b8_0>West Germany<b8_0/><a0_0/>. England had been 2–0 up, but were eventually beaten <a1_0>3–2<a1_0/> after extra time. They failed in qualification for the <a2_0><b5_0>1974<b5_0/><a2_0/>, leading to Ramsey's dismissal, and 1978 FIFA World Cups. Under Ron Greenwood, they managed to qualify for the 1982 FIFA World Cup in <a4_0><b6_0>Spain<b6_0/><a4_0/> (the first time competitively since 1962); despite not losing a game, they were eliminated in the second group stage.
